QuestData.Title: Pupellyverbos Port
QuestData.Description: You there! Did you know that strewn across the northern beach are tens, if not hundreds, of bottles of fine wine?$B$B...well, now you do!$B$BI'd be out there gathering them by the armload, if those turtles weren't out to get me. They crave my blood, I swear.$B$BSo I'll pay you then. Bring me 12 bottles of Pupellyverbos Port and I'll "purchase" it from you, $c.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have 12 bottles? I know how to count, you know!
QuestData.RewardText: Perfect! I don't know where I'd get this stuff if it wasn't for drunk humans repeatedly crashing their ships.$B$BNormally I'd settle down and get ready to haggle with you for an hour, but you're in luck; I'm too eager to crack these open. Cheers!
